argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | linply1.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | linply1.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | linply1.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | linply1.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | linply1.m | |- .- = ( -g ` P ) |
| 6 |  | linply1.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 7 |  | linply1.g | |- G = ( X .- ( A ` C ) ) |
| 8 |  | linply1.c | |- ( ph -> C e. K ) |
| 9 |  | linply1.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( P e. Ring -> P e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> P e. Grp ) |
| 13 | 4, 1, 2 | #P_vr1cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> X e. B ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 15 | 1, 6, 3, 2 | #P_ply1sclf | |- ( R e. Ring -> A : K --> B ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A : K --> B ) |
| 17 | 16, 8 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( A ` C ) e. B ) |
| 18 | 2, 5 | #P_grpsubcl | |- ( ( P e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ ( A ` C ) e. B ) -> ( X .- ( A ` C ) ) e. B ) |
| 19 | 12, 14, 17, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .- ( A ` C ) ) e. B ) |
| 20 | 7, 19 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> G e. B ) |
